First, we need to do some setup in order to start syncing with your timetable. Please follow the instructions below.

1. Open your web browser and go to your timetable page on the Collge of Science intranet.

2. Read the instructions below the timetable and copy the URL address of the link (long press). 

3. Go back to this app. Paste the content of your clipboard into the text input above.
Take a look at Profile settings to adjust your preferences.
Cannot display the date you selected.
Sorry, this doesn\'t seem to be a valid calendar URL.
Daily notifications on the day before
Notifications can be turned off in system settings.
